data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Advanced Design Tips
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Advanced Design Tips goes through Design from basic to advanced rules of design. Demo paintings included in this package.

Advanced Design Tips #1


Basics
  • Layer Cake
  • Rules of Three
  • Counter Balance

Intermediate
  • Avoid Parallels
  • Avoid Right Angles
  • Drawing in Perspective

Advanced
  • Shape Language
  • Strategies to design shapes
  • Invisible Vanishing Points

Advanced Design Tips #2


The Idea

Emotional
  • Angry
  • Sad
  • Happy

Self Projection

Cool
  • Not Cool
  • Pathetic
  • Cultural Differences

Advanced Design Tips #3

  • Form over Function
  • Audience vs Nostalgia
  • How does it work
  • Why does it work
  • How does it not work
  • Why does it not work

Advanced Design Tips #4, #5, #6

  • Demos

data.short_description: Advanced Design Tips goes through Design from basic to advanced rules of design. Demo paintings included in this package.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
